constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 122 (Tuesday, July 13, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. DeLAURO:
H.R. 4413.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, clause 3 provides Congress with the
power to ``regulate commerce with foreign nations, and among
the several states, and with the Indian tribes.''
[Page H3625]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

title: National Infrastructure Development Bank Act of 2021
